Name: Average time from 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time between 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes from 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due' to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time for 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' to influence the next step in the review process
Metric: The average of the duration between activity SW-Reviewer Agreed and the end of the case

Name: Total resolution time of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' in the context of manuscript review cycle
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity SW-Reviewer Agreed and the end of the case

Name: Average waiting time to the 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' from the initial reviewer invitation
Metric: The average of the duration between the start of the case and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time it takes 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' after 'Assign a Different Editor'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Assign a Different Editor' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time between 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Time of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' in relation to the overall review process duration
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity SW-Reviewer Agreed and the end of the case

Name: Elapsed time between 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and 'SW-EIC Major Revision' for manuscripts requiring major revisions
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' in accelerating the review process
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity SW-Reviewer Agreed and the end of the case

Name: Average time from 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' to 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation' for manuscripts undergoing revision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Total time for 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' in the context of achieving a final decision on the manuscript
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity SW-Reviewer Agreed and the end of the case

Name: Average time to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' grouped by 'case:concept:name'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
